trans-unit.source: The install tool has been locked

For security reasons, the install tool has been locked after a wrong password had been entered more than three times in a row. To unlock it, open the local configuration file and set installCount to 0.
trans-unit.target: Zbog sigurnosnih razloga instalacijski alat je zaključan nakon što je upisana pogrešna lozinka više od tri puta zaredom.Da bi ste ga otključali otvorite lokalni konfiguracijski fajl i postavite installCount na 0.

trans-unit.source: Please enter the install tool password. The install tool password is not the same as the Contao back end password.
trans-unit.target: Upišite lozinku za instalacijski alat. Ova lozinka nije ista kao lozinka za Contao backend.

trans-unit.source: To additionally secure the Contao install tool, you can either rename or completely remove the contao/install.php file.
trans-unit.target: Da bi ste dodatno osigurali skriptu, možete umetnuti exit; izjavu u typolight/install.php ili možete u potpunosti izbrisati fajl sa vašeg servera. U tom slučaju morate editovati postavke sistema direktno u lokalnom konfiguracijskom fajlu.

trans-unit.source: This key is used to store encrypted data. Please note that encrypted data can only be decrypted with this key! Therefore note it down and do not change it if there is encrypted data already. Leave empty to generate a random key.
trans-unit.target: Ovaj ključ koristi se za pohranjivanje šifrovanih podataka. Ne zaboravite da se šifrovani podaci mogu otvoriti samo s ovim ključem! Stoga ga zapišite i ne mijenjajte ako ste već šifrovali podatke. Ostavite prazno ako želite generirati slučajni ključ.

trans-unit.source: Please enter your database connection parameters.
trans-unit.target: Upišite parametre konekcije sa vašom bazom podataka.

trans-unit.source: For more information see the MySQL manual.
trans-unit.target: Za dodatne informacije pogledajte MySQL upute.

trans-unit.source: Please note that the update assistant has only been tested with MySQL and MySQLi drivers. If you are using a different database (e.g. Oracle), you might have to install or update your database manually.
trans-unit.target: Ne zaboravite da je asistent za ažuriranje testiran samo sa MySQL i MySQLi drajverima. Ako koristite drugačiju bazu podataka (npr. Oracle), možda će te morati ručno instalirati ili ažurirati vašu bazu podataka. U tom slučaju otiđite u system/modules i pretražite sve podmape za config/database.sql fajlove.

trans-unit.source: Here you can import an .sql file from the templates directory with a pre-configured example website. Existing data will be deleted! If you only want to import a theme, please use the theme manager in the Contao back end instead.
If you have imported the example website, the admin's username is k.jones and the password is kevinjones. See the example website (front end) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Ako ste importirali primjer sajta, admin korisničko ime je k.jones a lozinka je kevinjones. Pogledajte primjer sajta (frontend) za dodatne informacije.

trans-unit.source: Now please log into the Contao back end and check the system settings. Then visit your website to make sure that Contao is working correctly.
trans-unit.target: Sad se možete prijaviti u Contao backend i provjeriti postavke sistema. Zatim posjetite vaš sajt kako bi ste provjerili da on funkcioniše ispravno.

trans-unit.source: Your server does not support file access via PHP; most likely PHP runs as Apache module under a different user. Therefore please enter your FTP login details, so Contao can modify files via FTP (Safe Mode Hack).
trans-unit.target: Upišite detalje za vašu FTP prijavu kako bi Contao mogao izmjeniti fajlove putem FTP (Safe Mode Hack).

trans-unit.source: Please enter a password to prevent unauthorized access!
trans-unit.target: Molimo vas da promijenite standardnu lozinku kako bi spriječili neovlašteni pristup.

trans-unit.source: A custom password has been set.
An encryption key has to be at least 12 characters long!
trans-unit.target: Ključ za šifriranje mora imati barem 12 znakova!

trans-unit.source: An encryption key has been created.

trans-unit.target: Veza s bazom podataka je uredu.
Konekcija sa bazom podataka nije uspjela!

trans-unit.source: Changing the collation will affect all tables with a tl_ prefix.
trans-unit.target: Izmjena uspoređivanja utjecat će na sve tablice sa tl_ prefiksom.

trans-unit.source: The database is not up to date!
The database is up to date.
It seems that you are upgrading from a Contao version prior to version %s. If that is the case, it is required to run the version %s update to ensure the integrity of your data!
The import failed! Is the database structure up to date and is the template file compatible with your Contao version?
Any existing data will be deleted!
Any existing data will be deleted! Do you really want to continue?
trans-unit.target: Postojeći podaci bit će izbrisani! Da li zaista želite nastaviti?

trans-unit.source: Please fill in all fields to create an admin user!
trans-unit.target: Molimo vas da ispunite sva polja kako bi kreirali admin korisnika!

trans-unit.source: An admin user has been created.
Could not connect to FTP server %s
trans-unit.target: Povezivanje s FTP serverom %s nije uspjelo

trans-unit.source: The configured files directory does not exist!

Did you rename the tl_files folder to files? You cannot just rename the folder, because all the file references in the database and your style sheets will still point to the old location. If you want to rename the folder, please do so after the version 3 update and make sure to adjust your database data with the following script: %s.
